net.bytebuddy.asm

接口 AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredMethods.MethodVisitorWrapper

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Advice, AgentBuilder.LambdaInstrumentationStrategy.AlternativeMetaFactoryRedirection, AgentBuilder.LambdaInstrumentationStrategy.MetaFactoryRedirection, AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredMethods.Entry, MemberSubstitution
    封闭类:
    AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredMethods

    public static interface AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredMethods.MethodVisitorWrapper
    A method visitor wrapper that allows for wrapping a MethodVisitor defining a declared method.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MethodVisitor wrap(TypeDescription instrumentedType, MethodDescription instrumentedMethod, MethodVisitor methodVisitor, Implementation.Context implementationContext, TypePool typePool, int writerFlags, int readerFlags)
      Wraps a method visitor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • wrap

        MethodVisitor wrap(TypeDescription instrumentedType,
                   MethodDescription instrumentedMethod,
                   MethodVisitor methodVisitor,
                   Implementation.Context implementationContext,
                   TypePool typePool,
                   int writerFlags,
                   int readerFlags)
        Wraps a method visitor.
        参数:
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type.
        instrumentedMethod - The method that is currently being defined.
        methodVisitor - The original field visitor that defines the given method.
        implementationContext - The implementation context to use.
        typePool - The type pool to use.
        writerFlags - The ASM ClassWriter reader flags to consider.
        readerFlags - The ASM ClassReader reader flags to consider.
        返回:
        The wrapped method visitor.
